name: MyLittleAbyss -GGJ2021
description: Ever lost something under the sofa or between the cushions? You look everywhere but it's nowhere to be found, almost like it's gone to another dimension. In little Abyss you play as Floppie, the keeper of abyss of of lost items. You're job is to return items to their rightful owners by dragging the correct item into the light.
